articles.title: Handover Ceremony for the Chair of the School of Medicine, January 22, 2026
Congrats Dr. Tsan-Jan Chen (the postdoc in Prof. Wen-Ching Wang's lab), winning the Rising Star Award from 2025 AsCA
Congrat Dr. Yen-Hung Lin (the postdoc in Dr. Horng-Dar Wang's lab) winning the Poster Presentation Award from 2025 Joint Annual Conference
Congrat Mr. Hsiang Tung from Department of Life Science won the second place in the NTHU 2025 Student Academic Poster Competition!
Congratulations to Mr. Li-Zhong Guo from the Institute of Bioinformatics and Structural Biology for receiving the Poster Award at the 2025 MOPM Joint Conference on Multiomics and Precision Medicine!
Research Project of Professor Linyi Chen of the College: USE OF ISORHOIFOLIN DERIVATIVES ON REGENERATION OF INJURED NEURONS Recipient of the 2025 Future Tech Award
Congratulations to our faculty member on their promotion, effective August 1, 2025.
Congratulations to our faculty members for receiving the Outstanding Teaching Award for the 113th Academic Year
